name: Jaynky Space Exploration Simulator
description:
What does it mean to be Jaynky? Is it about being self-reliant? a rejection of corporate branding in favor of DIYing it? or is it about doing things our way?

This game is the embodiment of these ideals and more. Each art asset from music to sprites was custom done during the game jam. Instead of hosting it on a traditional ICANN domain, we decided to host it on a decentralized DNS project (Handshake DNS). The gameplay itself is about exploring and making your own journey to the planets. 

 Join the Jaynky community's discord server.

---Under Construction---

Explore a colorful solar system on (probably) the first game to be hosted on a domain using HDNS (Handshake DNS). HDNS is a more private secure means of hosting domain names than ICANN. If you want to be a legend and play this game in its intended form, follow these instructions to change your DNS provider and access this link.

We made it playable in the browser for those normies out there.
